sentences.english: Results Food-poisoning accidents happen more frequently in the third quarter.
sentences.chinese: 結果食物中毒事故第三季度高發。

sentences.english: The poison is in her blood and on her breath.
sentences.chinese: 現在她的血液和呼吸中毒有劇毒。

sentences.english: They're also used to kill bacteria and prevent botulism.
sentences.chinese: 它們亦用於殺菌以及防止肉毒中毒。

sentences.english: The domestic report botulism causes to breathe the myoparalysis case of illness to be less.
sentences.chinese: 國內報道肉毒中毒導致呼吸肌麻痹的病例較少。

sentences.english: Forced diuresis e. g. management of barbiturate poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 強迫利尿，例如管理巴比妥中毒。

sentences.english: Alkalosis and potassium depletion may be pronounced.
Objective To analyze the characteristics of the drug poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析綜合醫院急診科藥物中毒的特點。

sentences.english: As the main human oral absorption by poisoning, lethal dose of 10 to 5 milliliters.
sentences.chinese: 人類主經經口服吸收中毒，致死量爲10～5毫升。

sentences.english: Recently, he worried about a case of lead poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 最近，他正擔憂着一樁鉛中毒案件。

sentences.english: We want to know the progress of treating toxic wound caused by cobra.
sentences.chinese: 我們想知道眼鏡王蛇咬傷中毒的治療進展。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the curative effect of hemoperfusion for acute drug poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討血液灌流對急性藥物中毒的治療效果。

sentences.english: Other marine animals eat the plastic, which can poison them or lead to deadly blockages.
sentences.chinese: 其他海洋動物若吃了塑料，會中毒或導致致命的梗塞。

sentences.english: This is because the water content of fresh day lily have Colchicine can cause poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲鮮黃花菜中含水量有秋水仙鹼，會引起中毒。

sentences.english: When finding potential occupational poisoning accidents, they shall make reports in time.
sentences.chinese: 發現職業中毒事故隱患時，應當及時報告。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the pathomorphological characteristics of acute bromadiolone poisoning in guinea pigs.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察豚鼠食人溴敵隆急性中毒的病理形態學特點。

sentences.english: Objective To find out the cause of food-poisoning on a passenger train .
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解旅客列車上發生食物中毒的原因。

definition: to lead to death/to result in death
